author: Garrett M. Graff
title: New Yorkers, Once Again at Ground Zero, in Their Own Words
description: This week in our living oral history, the city’s residents—from the great to the humble—try to come to grips with a metropolis under assault by a virus.
content: Nearly 19 years after the 9/11 attacks tore a hole through the New York City, the eight million residents of the metropolis find themselves once again at ground zero. While other cities, like New Orleans, Seattle, and Detroit, have struggled or are struggling… [+6241 chars]
